firerate.title: Firerate Upgrade
firerate.description: Increases the rate of fire by @1

heal.title: Heal
heal.description:
Heals you @1
*Can not overflow max HP*

armor.title: Armor Upgrade
armor.description:
Increases your armor by @1
Armor lowers damage taken
 by 0.5 for each point*
-Rounded with RNG-

freezing_b.title: Freezing Bullets
freezing_b.description:
Every @1th bullet freezes enemies
*@2% to firerate*

triple_shot.title: Triple Shot
triple_shot.description:
You have @1% chance to shoot 3 bullets
*@2% to firerate*

double_trouble.title: Double Trouble
double_trouble.description:
Every chance based effect
is twice as likely to happen

bounce.title: bounce
bounce.description:
Your bullets have @1% chance to
bounce off walls
*@2% damage*

blitz.title: blitz
blitz.description:
Increases damage by @1 per each
whole firerate you have
*Bypasses damage multiplier*
*@2% damage*

particle_accelerator.title: Particle Accelerator
particle_accelerator.description:
Increases your firerate by @1 per
each bullet speed you have
*Bypasses firerate multiplier*
*@2% bullet speed*

homing_b.title: Homing Bullets
homing_b.description:
Every @1th bullet is a HOMING one
!Homing scales with Bullet Speed!
*@2% bullet speed*

shoot_on_death.title: Last Stand Of Good
shoot_on_death.description:
When enemies die, they shoot @1 bullet
in direction of a random enemy
*Caps out at @2 bullets*

lifesteal.title: Lifesteal
lifesteal.description:
You have @1% chance to heal @2hp
when killing an enemy
*Chance caps out at @3%*

shoot_on_death_up.title: Last Stand Upgrade
shoot_on_death_up.description:
Increases amount of bullets shot from
enemies on thier death by @1
*Current amount @2*
*Caps out at @3*

lifesteal_up.title: Lifesteal Upgrade
lifesteal_up.description:
Incearses chance to heal when
killing enemies by @1%
*Current chance @2%*
*Caps out at @3%*
